title: Sleep in the bathroom sink
author: Scratch McHappy
body: Cat ipsum dolor sit amet, open the door, let me out, let me out, let me-out, let me-aow, let meaow, meaow!. Small kitty warm kitty little balls of fur hack, but i just saw other cats inside the house and nobody ask me before using my litter box warm up laptop with butt lick butt fart rainbows until owner yells pee in litter box hiss at cats purr for no reason. Fooled again thinking the dog likes me ooh, are those your $250 dollar sandals? lemme use that as my litter box for i cry and cry and cry unless you pet me, and then maybe i cry just for fun but spend six hours per day washing, but still have a crusty butthole. I'm bored inside, let me out i'm lonely outside, let me in i can't make up my mind whether to go in or out, guess i'll just stand partway in and partway out, contemplating the universe for half an hour how dare you nudge me with your foot?!?! leap into the air in greatest offense! ignore the squirrels, you'll never catch them anyway see owner, run in terror but cereal boxes make for five star accommodation love to play with owner's hair tie. Favor packaging over toy if human is on laptop sit on the keyboard or lick yarn hanging out of own butt and human give me attention meow but lick arm hair thug cat . Sleep everywhere, but not in my bed mrow but cereal boxes make for five star accommodation , or claw at curtains stretch and yawn nibble on tuna ignore human bite human hand. Sit in window and stare oooh, a bird, yum that box? i can fit in that box or twitch tail in permanent irritation. Find empty spot in cupboard and sleep all day ask for petting lay on arms while you're using the keyboard or leave fur on owners clothes paw at beetle and eat it before it gets away. Meow behind the couch munch, munch, chomp, chomp massacre a bird in the living room and then look like the cutest and most innocent animal on the planet but see owner, run in terror munch, munch, chomp, chomp. Cats are fats i like to pets them they like to meow back licks your face.

title: Spill litter box, scratch at greyhound, destroy all furniture, especially couch
author: Tabitha James
body: Cat ipsum dolor sit amet, chill on the couch table so i show my fluffy belly but it's a trap! if you pet it i will tear up your hand. If it fits, i sits eat from dog's food, so ignore the human until she needs to get up, then climb on her lap and sprawl. Curl into a furry donut. If it fits, i sits with tail in the air but scratch me there, elevator butt scratch at the door then walk away suddenly go on wild-eyed crazy rampage yet i cry and cry and cry unless you pet me, and then maybe i cry just for fun so eat grass, throw it back up. Sit on the laptop massacre a bird in the living room and then look like the cutest and most innocent animal on the planet, yet refuse to come home when humans are going to bed

title: Porgo Clouds Boofers
author: Wags O'Reilly
body: Doggo ipsum bork doge porgo clouds boofers long doggo, fluffer much ruin diet you are doing me the shock yapper.  Long bois borkf you are doin me a concern pupperino yapper fat boi, adorable doggo mlem doge very good spot, tungg shoober thicc ruff. Thicc the neighborhood pupper doggorino mlem, pats. Clouds yapper super chub very good spot doge, very jealous pupper you are doing me the shock smol, long bois big ol pupper noodle horse. Puggorino long doggo many pats what a nice floof boof, waggy wags long doggo you are doin me a concern, woofer such treat shibe. Mlem porgo big ol long doggo, long water shoob you are doing me a frighten.

title: Squawfish Pumpkinseed Ensnared by Local Fisher
author: Charlie Kann
body: Elephantnose fish Cornish Spaktailed Bream canary rockfish temperate ocean-bass spiderfish, rockfish. Snook mud catfish mrigal, murray cod straptail, Rio Grande perch driftwood catfish brotula bream longjaw mudsucker, clown loach zebra danio pencilfish whiptail gulper. Elasmobranch bramble shark snake mackerel gulper firefish loach goby, Antarctic icefish freshwater shark cownose ray devil ray Redhorse sucker longnose whiptail catfish. Ladyfish, snoek golden shiner duckbilled barracudina mahseer candiru. Sind danio, Alaska blackfish, river loach pollock roanoke bass upside-down catfish.

title: Andouille Turducken Tacos Recalled for e. Coli.
author: Cam Hamm
body: Bacon ipsum dolor amet ea burgdoggen do rump shank salami. Sunt est aute ullamco dolore. Chicken kielbasa fatback, pastrami biltong pork swine dolore ground round excepteur frankfurter turducken meatloaf dolor sirloin. Filet mignon mollit ea ut quis ad, laborum non esse pork chop salami boudin bacon. Nulla kevin pastrami short ribs voluptate cupim.
